channel.title: Form Recognizer on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Form Recognizer on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: How to Use Form Recognizer to Extract Items From Receipt
item.description:
In this article, Let’s use Azure Form Recognizer, latest AI-OCR tool developed by Microsoft to extract items from receipt.

  • Setup Azure (Microsoft Cloud Computing Services) account
  • Setup Form Recognizer Studio setting
  • Use prebuild model to extract items from receipt downloaded from Intenet
